channel.title: bike on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in bike on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.8: Bike writing
item.description: 22nd September 2014 Dear all, How are you? The last couple of weeks have been quieter but no less busy. I’ve been looking for a bike and may get one soon.

item.title: LOG 1.5: Snow, it turns to rain
item.description: 15th January, 2011 Hello everyone, It has been a while since I last wrote. I’ve been busy seeing houses, working (:O ! :)), and going out with friends.

item.title: LfE 16: Back in Edinburgh
item.description: 12/01/2010 Hi everyone, Hope you all had a good holiday. I’m back in Edinburgh, this familiar and beautiful city. I actually have developed a kind of loyalty to it.
